column.name: type
column.text: 资源类型：100=菜单 200=页面元素 300=数据查询条件 400=页面 401=链接

statements.statement:
select A.* ,B.name pname from uum_res A left join uum_res B on A.pid=B.id where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( A.name like '%${key}%' or A.code like '%${key}%' or A.node_path like '%${key}%' or A.remark like '%${key}%' or A.app_code like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and A.id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.pid??> and A.pid = ${query.pid} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}%' </#if>
<#if query.code??> and A.code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.type??> and A.type = ${query.type} </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and A.sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.nodePath??> and A.node_path like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.nodePath)}%' </#if>
<#if query.nodePathList?? && (query.nodePathList?size > 0)> and ( <#list query.nodePathList as nodePath> A.node_path like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(nodePath)}%' <#if nodePath_has_next>or</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}%' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(A.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.idNotIn??> and A.id not in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.idNotIn)}) </#if>
<#-- 获取用户最终权限!!! --> <#if query.userId??> and A.id in( select res_id from uum_role_res where role_id in ( -- 查找部门、组、称谓的角色 select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_id in( select obj_id /* 角色、部门、组、称谓ID */ from uum_user_object where user_id=1 and obj_type in(1,2,3,4) ) union -- 查找用户的角色 select obj_id from uum_user_object where user_id=1 and obj_type=7 ) ) </#if>
<#-- 获取部门的权限(不含子级) --> <#if query.orgId??> and A.id in( select res_id from uum_role_res where role_id in( select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_type=3 and obj_id=${query.orgId})) </#if>
<#-- 获取部门的权限(含子级) --> <#if query.orgIds??> and A.id in( select res_id from uum_role_res where role_id in( select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_type=3 and obj_id in (${query.orgIds}))) </#if>
<#-- 获取角色下的资源 --> <#if query.roleIds??> and A.id in (select res_id from uum_role_res where role_id in(${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.roleIds)})) </#if>
<#-- 获取组下的资源 --> <#if query.groupIds??> and A.id in (select res_id from uum_role_res where role_id in (select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_id in(${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.groupIds)}) and obj_type=4)) </#if>
<#-- 获取称谓的权限 --> <#if query.titleIds??> and A.id in ( select res_id from uum_role_res where role_id in ( select role_id from uum_object_role where obj_id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.titleIds)}) and obj_type in (1,2))) </#if>
</#if>
